alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 03 at 9:38PM EDT until August 04 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 3 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Water levels may approach flood stage in isolated locations tonight. Minor flooding is possible in low lying areas. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 3 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/02 AM 10.4 1.6 0.2 3 None 04/02 PM 9.6 0.8 0.4 3 None 05/02 AM 10.3 1.5 0.4 3 None 05/03 PM 9.6 0.8 0.3 2 None 06/03 AM 9.8 1.0 0.3 2 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/02 AM 10.7 1.2 0.3 3 None 04/02 PM 10.0 0.5 0.5 3 None 05/02 AM 10.7 1.2 0.5 3 None 05/03 PM 10.0 0.5 0.4 2 None 06/03 AM 10.1 0.6 0.4 2 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/01 AM 11.8 2.1 0.3 2 None 04/02 PM 10.8 1.1 0.4 2 None 05/02 AM 11.6 1.9 0.4 2 None 05/03 PM 10.8 1.1 0.3 1 None 06/03 AM 10.9 1.2 0.2 1 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
